subject: Re: [junit] Problem with IDEA and the JUnit 4 Description hierarchy
msgSnippet: Hi David, ... I did ping JetBrains and got a response that they ll forward my question to the responsible developer. I ll report back when I know more about
messageBody:
Hi David,

On 2/21/07, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
> Seriously, the text runner and Eclipse runner seem to work fine in
> this regard, and your descriptions look fine. Description is designed
> to not really allow for "incorrect" configurations. It looks like
> IDEA has some kind of funky adapter that's not dealing well with
> custom runners--would you mind pinging them about it?

I did ping JetBrains and got a response that they'll forward my
question to the responsible developer. I'll report back when I know
more about the issue.

Lasse
